We are an end-to-end solution for creating, issuing, and managing Digital Credentials

We enable conference and training producers to automate their credential issuing process and maximize brand presence.

,

Easy to use, Secure & Cost Effective, comes with everything you need to get started with your Digital Credential Program.

,

Highly Secure

Our systems are built keeping a security-first mindset. Our encryption algorithms and access/ authentication techniques are state-of-the-art to ensure maximum security for your credentials. The data that we process and store are saved in specialized managed database servers which can only be accessed by our secure application servers thus drastically reducing any risk of unauthorized access or data theft.

Cost Effective

Our Credential platform is the most pocket-friendly platform. Our credential prices can come down as low as $0.008 / month. The reason of our cost effective pricing model is that we deploy a high level of automation to ensure Quality is topnotch while ensuring Costs low. Another key feature is that you only need to pay as much as you use, i.e. you can even buy & issue a single Credential.

Easy to use

Our Credential platform is known for its user experience and ease of use. One can create and issue credentials in a jiffy. We also provide productivity tools like Bulk Award where you can award credentials by uploading a CSV file. Our platform is also integrated with the Canva, enabling users to create professional-looking credential templates easily.

Automate your Credential issuing process.

CertifyMe.Online is an end-to-end solution for creating, issuing, and managing your Digital Credentials. Reduce your manual effort spend in issuing and maintaining your credential process. Our Automation reduces upto 100% of the mundane task associated with the credential issuing process. We also provide API access for enabling 100% automation.

Try it Free

Award Verifiable Digital Badges and Certificates.

A verifiable credential is valued 3.7 X times than an ordinary unverifiable credential. Each of our credentials is enabled with a unique QR Code to establish seamless traceability. Your credentials can further be linked with the awardee's unique identity like a Passport number, Social security number, Driving license, etc to ensures the awarded Digital Credentials can never be forged. We also support old fashion email-based manual verification.

Try it Free

Maximize brand presence.

Our platform helps you to publish your credentials on 50+ social media platforms. These sharable credentials enable you to drive 10X more relevant traffic to your events over paid advertisements. Our credential webpages are customizable to include a branding banner and CTA button. Utilize this space to market your products/services or resell it to your sponsors.

Try it Free

Solutions

,

Award your credentials using our platform

Get started in 3 simple steps. (1) Sign up. (2) Create your Credential template. (3) Start awarding. Our application automates the mundane task of Credential authoring, generation, and publication. Each credential is hosted on unique Webpage. The generated Credential Webpages are mobile/social media-friendly and sharable across 50+ social media platforms.

Starting $0 / credential

Deploy your own Digital Credential Platform

Stand out, deploy your own Digital Credential Platform using our Framework. Your credential systems would run on dedicated servers ensuring a high level of security & customisability. You can also award unlimited amount of credentials. Just sit back and relax while our tech team does all the heavy lifting to ensure your Credential Platform is performing at its best.

About us

CertifyMe.Online is an end-to-end solution for creating, issuing, and managing Digital Credentials.

We are a SAAS-based Startup Based out of Bangalore India.

As a philosophy, we believe that when our platform generates a credential we also generate a possibility of an extra smile on this planet.

Our mission is to become the most trusted credential platform and thus maximizing the number of smiles generated by end of 2023. We would love if you could be part of our humble journey.
